mapper.sql: id, sys_phoneConsult_service_id, sys_patient_id, state, create_time, update_time, register_no, illness_describe_id,phone
mapper.select:
select crs.id, crs.phone userPhone,cdr.doctor_answer_phone doctorPhone,cdr.server_length conversationLength from consultPhone_register_service crs left join sys_consultPhone_service scs on crs.sys_phoneConsult_service_id = scs.id left join consultphone_doctor_relation cdr on cdr.doctor_id = scs.sys_doctor_id where 1=1
and crs.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select sd.id doctorId, sd.name doctorName, sd.position1, sd.position2, sd.hospitalName, dhr.department_level1 as departmentName, case when crs.state ='0' then '待支付' when crs.state ='1' then '待接听' when crs.state ='2' then '待评价' when crs.state ='3' then '待分享' when crs.state ='4' then '已取消' when crs.state ='5' then '已完成' end state, DATE_FORMAT(scs.beginTime,'%k:%i') beginTime, DATE_FORMAT(scs.endTime,'%k:%i') endTime, DATE_FORMAT(scs.date,'%Y/%m/%d') date, DATE_FORMAT(crs.create_time,'%Y/%m/%d %k:%i') orderTime, crs.id orderId, crs.register_no as orderNo, crs.phone, sbi.name babyName, cdr.price, crs.type, crs.surplusTime, sp.sys_user_id, cdr.server_length from consultPhone_register_service crs left join sys_consultPhone_service scs on crs.sys_phoneConsult_service_id = scs.id left join sys_doctor sd on sd.id = scs.sys_doctor_id LEFT JOIN doctor_hospital_relation dhr ON dhr.sys_doctor_id=sd.id left join sys_patient sp on sp.id = crs.sys_patient_id left join sys_baby_baseInfo sbi on sp.sys_user_id = sbi.userid LEFT join consultphone_doctor_relation cdr on cdr.doctor_id = sd.id where crs.id =#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} group by crs.id

SELECT sd.`name`, sd.position2, sd.hospitalName, crs.id, crs.state, crs.create_time, crs.register_no, crs.illness_describe_id, scp.date, scp.createDate, scp.endTime FROM consultPhone_register_service crs LEFT JOIN sys_patient sp ON crs.sys_patient_id = sp.id LEFT JOIN sys_consultPhone_service scp ON scp.id = crs.sys_phoneConsult_service_id LEFT JOIN sys_doctor sd ON sd.id = scp.sys_doctor_id WHERE sp.sys_user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and crs.state = #{state,VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into consultPhone_register_service (id, sys_phoneConsult_service_id, sys_patient_id, state, create_time, update_time, register_no, illness_describe_id,phone) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sysPhoneconsultServiceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sysPatientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{registerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{illnessDescribeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{phoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into consultPhone_register_service
id,
sys_phoneConsult_service_id,
sys_patient_id,
state,
create_time,
update_time,
register_no,
illness_describe_id,
phone,
surplusTime,
create_by,
type,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{sysPhoneconsultServiceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{sysPatientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{registerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{illnessDescribeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{phoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{surplusTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{creat_by,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update consultPhone_register_service
sys_phoneConsult_service_id = #{sysPhoneconsultServiceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sys_patient_id = #{sysPatientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
register_no = #{registerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
illness_describe_id = #{illnessDescribeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
phone = #{phoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
callSid = #{callSid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
surplusTime = #{surplusTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update consultPhone_register_service set sys_phoneConsult_service_id = #{sysPhoneconsultServiceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sys_patient_id = #{sysPatientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, register_no = #{registerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, illness_describe_id = #{illnessDescribeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, phone = #{phoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
